name: semasim-frontend
description: Parts of Semasim executed on the browser

scripts.postinstall: npm run fetch-web-assets && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run b-api && npm run b-tools && npm run b-shared && npm run b-pages && npm run tsc
scripts.b-api: cd api && npm install && npm run tsc
scripts.b-tools: cd tools && npm install && npm run tsc
scripts.b-shared: cd shared && npm install && npm run tsc
scripts.b-pages: npm run b-login && npm run b-register && npm run b-manager && npm run b-webphone
scripts.b-login: cd pages/login && npm install && npm run build
scripts.b-register: cd pages/register && npm install && npm run build
scripts.b-manager: cd pages/manager && npm install && npm run build
scripts.b-webphone: cd pages/webphone && npm install && npm run build
scripts.watch: node ./pages/login/node_modules/concurrently/src/main --kill-others "npm run w-api" "npm run w-tools" "npm run w-shared" "npm run w-pages"
scripts.w-pages: node ./pages/login/node_modules/concurrently/src/main --kill-others "npm run w-login" "npm run w-register" "npm run w-manager" "npm run w-webphone"

author: Joseph Garrone
